body: This is just simply a suggestion to add a working /vote command which displays the goo.gl links in chat. This is so we can easily just click them and go. I know when logging in to the HUB it has 1 voting link but I noticed that there are 2 more that aren't displayed. Thank you! :D
body_tagged: This is just simply a suggestion to add a working /vote command which displays the goo.gl links in chat. This is so we can easily just click them and go. I know when logging in to the HUB it has 1 voting link but I noticed that there are 2 more that aren't displayed. Thank you! :D
title: Voting Links In-game
